title: Article on West Indies migration - result

content.question: Which of the following best describes a result of Puerto Rican migrants “swelling the Negro population”?

choices.label: Puerto Ricans were embraced and treated equally despite their ethnic origins.
Puerto Ricans migrated and dispersed throughout North America.
Harlem’s African American community protested the significant increase of Afro-Caribbean immigrants.
The arrival of Afro-Caribbean immigrants to Harlem sparked tension but also created new blends of Black culture.

content.answer: The arrival of Afro-Caribbean immigrants to Harlem sparked tension but also created new blends of Black culture.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
